name: caromax fiber
description: caromax fiber is a dietary fiber produced from the pulp of the carob fruit. Its mild and patented manufacturing procedure preserves the high quality of its nutritionally essential components. The result is a product with a total dietary fiber content of more than 80 %.caromax fiberâ€™s unique composition is characterized by its high content of dietary fiber (especially lignin), polyphenols and pinitol, which is the general basis for a variety of health perspectives.
